Bud & Alley‚Äôs Pizza Bar + Trattoria Skip to content Menus Order Online Rewards Gallery Contact & Hours Back to Bud & Alleys Neapolitan Wood‚ÄëFired Pizza And italian inspired dishes Bud & Alley‚Äôs Pizza Bar + Trattoria Bud & Alley‚Äôs Pizza Bar + Trattoria in Seaside, Florida serves authentic Neapolitan wood-fired pizza and housemade dishes using traditional cooking techniques. Everything is made by hand, including fresh mozzarella and naturally leavened sourdough baked daily. The restaurant offers a carefully curated selection of handcrafted cocktails, wine, and craft beer alongside a menu that celebrates local land and sea ingredients. Bud & Alley's Waterfront Restaurant & Bar - Rooftop bar Emerald Coast | The Rooftop Guide Rooftop Bars Europe North America Central America & Caribbean South America Asia Middle East Oceania Africa Rooftop Pools Inspiration Sign up North America Rooftop bars in Emerald Coast Emerald Coast rooftop bar Bud & Alley's Waterfront Restaurant & Bar $ $ $ $ $ 2nd floor Seaside Images belong to the bar Last updated: May 25, 2023 Bud & Alley's Waterfront Restaurant & Bar Rooftop Bar in Emerald Coast Ocean Seafood / American Year round No Overview Waterfront restaurant and rooftop bar in the heart of Seaside. Located right on the waterfront in Seaside, Bud & Alley's is somewhat a classic gathering place, founded already in 1987 and still going very strong. Serving good food and good times, there are both indoor and outdoor dining areas on the ground floor, but the very best spot is the second floor rooftop terrace and bar, providing fantastic views over the Gulf. The restaurant serves fresh farm-to-table (or water-to-table) American and seafood dishes for both lunch and dinners. If you are not hungry, the Bud & Alley's rooftop bar is probably the best place around to grab a specialty cocktail or a glass of wine and watch the sun set in the ocean. Come as you are and enjoy the fun and vibrant atmosphere, but don't expect to be alone, as this is √¢¬Ä¬úthe place to be√¢¬Ä¬ù when dakness falls over Seaside. Watch Location & Map 2236 East County Road 30-A, Seaside, Florida Contact +1 850-231-5900 info@budandalleys.com Visit website Facebook Instagram Opening Hours Monday: 11.00 - 21.00 Tuesday: 11.00 - 21.00 Wednesday: 11.00 - 21.00 Thursday: 11.00 - 21.00 Friday: 11.00 - 21.00 Saturday: 08.00 - 21.00 Sunday: 08.00 - 21.00 FAQ What is the Bud & Alley's Waterfront Restaurant & Bar dress code? The Bud & Alley's Waterfront Restaurant & Bar dress code is casual. What food does Bud & Alley's Waterfront Restaurant & Bar serve? Bud & Alley's Waterfront Restaurant & Bar serves fresh American and seafood dishes. Rating By: Rikard Fredricson Rikard has spent the last 10 years exploring, enjoying, researching and working with rooftop venues. During these years he has visited more than 700 rooftops across the globe. The experience he has gained is used to create helpful, in-depth and accessible content, and to share his knowledge and rooftop expertise with fellow rooftop-lovers. Havana Beach Rooftop Lounge At The Pearl Hotel in Rosemary Beach you find both Havana Beach Bar & Grill and Havana Beach Rooftop Lounge. Closely linked together, the former is a vibrant restaurant serving Gulf Coast Americana cuisine with Caribbean influences to enjoy at... Pescado Seafood Grill & Rooftop Bar A casual fine dining, seafood grill & rooftop bar overlooking the Gulf of Mexico and offering magical sunsets over the ocean. With both dining room, inside bar and an al fresco rooftop bar, Pescado in Rosemary Beach is a place worth visiting for... Bud & Alley‚Äôs has been an award winning iconic staple in Seaside Florida for nearly four decades, serving delicious farm- and fish-to-table food, offering exceptional service and making seaside memories for generations. Our dedicated team look forward to ushering in the next 40 years of Good Food, Good People, and Good Times in Seaside! 2236 East County Road 30-A. Seaside, Florida | 850.231.5900 Serving Seaside, Florida since 1986 Gulf-to-table View our Menus Book Now Reservations Order Online Order Pickup Merchandise Coming Soon Seaside, Florida Beach Cam Overlooking the Gulf Roof Deck Our Press Florida‚Äôs 17 Most Legendary Restaurants ‚ÄúBud & Alley‚Äôs is an iconic oceanfront eatery along Highway 30A. Founded by a couple of 24-year-old surfing buddies (and named for a cat and dog in a town that only boasted twelve houses at the time), it was the first restaurant and watering hole to open in Seaside. It‚Äôs still serving up its beloved crab cakes today. Take in the sunset from the rooftop bar with epic views.‚Äù Read More Gallery View Gallery Rewards & Gift Cards Earn one point for every $1.50 spent and unlock $5 off every 50 points. Join Now Buy Now Make a Reservation Beachside Events of Your Dreams Ready to create your own seaside memories? Whether you're planning a romantic sunset dinner or gathering friends for good food and good times, we'd love to welcome you to our restaurant overlooking the Gulf. We recommend booking in advance, especially for weekend evenings and our coveted sunset seating. Reservations Meet. Celebrate. Gather. Events For over 30 years Bud & Alley‚Äôs Waterfront Restaurant has proudly held this position in Seaside, Florida and earned the honor of being one of the finest restaurants and inspired event venues on the Emerald Coast. Beautiful private spaces and dining rooms, flexible package options, and top-notch B&A‚Äôs service. Expect the exceptional. For nearly 30 years, Bud & Alley‚Äôs Waterfront Restaurant has been the ultimate beachfront venue for hosting inspired special events on the sparkling, white sand beaches of Seaside, Florida. Bud & Alley‚Äôs has an outstanding reputation for delivering superior service and award-winning Southern coastal cuisine. The Bud & Alley‚Äôs Special Events team is dedicated to making your special event a memorable one. Gulf View Herb Garden Deck Gulf View Porch Buffet Room Main Dining Room 30A Facing Sun Deck Tarpon Club Event Spaces Gulf View Herb Garden Deck Fits Approximately 150 people Offering stunning vistas of the Gulf of Mexico. Our Gulf View Deck is an unforgettable setting for special occasions, providing an exclusive and picturesque backdrop for your gathering. Inquire Now about Gulf View Herb Garden Deck Gulf View Porch Fits Approximately 40 people An elegant setting with beautiful views of the Gulf of Mexico. Ideal for intimate gatherings and celebrations, it promises a memorable experience for your guests. It offers a classic setting for your celebration, ensuring a delightful experience for all your guests. Inquire Now about Main Dining Room 30A Facing Sun Deck Fits Approximately 60 people Overlooking the picturesque town of Seaside, towering Palms, and iconic, scenic highway 30-a, this second-floor patio feels both refreshing and inviting. This breezy, outdoor space could be the coastal and casual vibe you've been looking for! Inquire Now about 30A Facing Sun Deck Tarpon Club Fits Approximately 200 people Bud & Alley's renowned Tarpon Club offers panoramic Gulf views and the best place (on Earth) to watch the sunset. It's warm, inviting atmosphere makes it a fan favorite.
